detail_desc: Thong briefs in jersey and lace with a mid, V-shaped waist and lined gusset.
Football shirt in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif front and back. Short raglan sleeves ending in a double layer in a contrasting colour.
Belt in regenerated leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 3.5 cm.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Dress in an airy, patterned weave with elastication at the top, narrow, braided shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and asymmetric hem. Lined.
Knee-length satin skirt with lacing at the front, pleats and a concealed zip in the side. Unlined.

Long-sleeved top and a pair of leggings in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with a print motif, dropped shoulders with press-studs at one side and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Sandals with adjustable foot straps and a loop at the back. Moulded thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles, fluted underneath.
Hat in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with a faux fur pompom on top, earflaps and ties under the chin. Unlined.
Knee-length shirt dress in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Short dress in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, side pockets, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Kangol x H&M. Adjustable belt in a jacquard weave with a plastic snap lock.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft fleece with a zip at the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, flared, pleated skirt in a checked weave made from a viscose blend with a concealed zip and metal press-stud at one side. Unlined.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Sleeveless dress in sequined tulle with a gathered seam and detachable, satin tie belt at the waist. Zip at the back and a gently bell-shaped skirt in a double layer of tulle. Jersey lining.
Maxi dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist with a sewn-in wrapover and decorative ties. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Shorts in soft organic cotton slub jersey with decorative buttons at the front, an elasticated waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in ribbed jersey with long sleeves and decorative buttons down the front.
Shorts in printed lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems with the reverse side showing.
Leather belt. Width 2.3 cm.
Long-sleeved blouse in satin with a small stand-up collar and concealed buttons down the front. Wide cuffs with a slit and button, and a rounded hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned fleece that fasten down the front and along one leg. Ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot detail.
Knee-high boots in imitation suede with a zip in one side and drawstring at the top. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Short-sleeved top in lightweight jersey with a V-neck.
Skirt in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise and an elasticated waist. Lined.
Ankle-length jeans in soft, washed denim. High, elasticated paper bag waist with a small frill trim and detachable tie belt, and wide, straight legs.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 2.9 cm.
Trousers in glossy jersey with elastication containing glittery threads at the waist and flared legs.

Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton blend with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, darts at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Set in soft organic cotton jersey with a print motif. T-shirt with press-studs on the shoulders. Shorts with ribbing and a decorative drawstring at the waist. Cap with elastication at the back and a soft peak.
Imitation leather sandals with an embroidered appliqué at the front. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Wide, round-necked blouse in an airy cotton weave with covered buttons at the top, long raglan, balloon sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button.
Twill cap with an imitation leather appliqué at the front, a contrasting colour peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist with a detachable belt and a concealed zip in one side. Side pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Fully lined swimsuit with an all-over print, narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and frills at the top.
Long-sleeved blouse in a softly draping weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Slightly wider sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, twisted side seams and slits at the hem. Longer at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and elasticated crossover straps at the waist and sides. High-cut at the back.
Sleeveless dress in printed jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Cable-knit dog jumper containing some wool with a foldover collar and ribbing around the front legs.

Dungaree shorts in soft washed denim with adjustable straps with a press-stud and a seam at the waist with press-studs at the sides. Chest pocket with text embroidery, a back pocket, fake front pockets and belt loops at the front. Short legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Blouse in woven fabric with printed stripes. Collar with detachable ties, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly, spacious side pockets, welt back pockets and a discreet coin pocket.

Leggings in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist and legs with contrasting colour side stripes and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the leggings is partly recycled.
Fitted, turtleneck top in ribbed jersey with long raglan sleeves.
Fabric belt with leather details and a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim, side pockets and tapered legs.
Fully lined bikini. Flounced top with narrow shoulder straps with a small metal decoration attached to one strap. Matching bottoms.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with embroidered appliqués. Press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, gently fitted dress in jersey made from a viscose blend with spaghetti shoulder straps.

Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton blend with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, darts at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved shirt in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs and two flap chest pockets with a button. Yoke at the back and a rounded hem.
Non-wired push-up bra top in ribbed jersey with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back. No fasteners.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Chinos in cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Detachable, braided belt in imitation suede with a metal buckle.
Calf-length dress in a rib knit with a sheen. Wrapover front with ties at the waist and long sleeves.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a brushed finish. High waist and a concealed zip in one side. Recycled polyester lining.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a motif.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in soft, garter-stitched organic cotton with buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Brazilian briefs in soft microfibre with a low, elasticated waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Lightweight, padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood and zip with a chin guard. Side pockets and narrow elastication around the hood, at the cuffs and hem.
Double-breasted, knee-length coat in a patterned weave containing some wool. Wide notch lapels, long raglan sleeves, a detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Hi-tops in imitation leather and mesh with a padded shaft, adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Thong briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Set with a long-sleeved dress and pair of leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey. Dress with a seam below the waist and a flared skirt. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Coat in a felted wool blend with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and buttons down the front. Chest pocket, welt side pockets, two inner pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Cargo trousers in soft washed cotton twill with fake front pockets, real back pockets and flap leg pockets. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 1½-10Y), a fake fly and slim legs with short slits at the hems.
Short cardigan in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves.

Oversized boiler suit in a cotton crêpe weave with notch lapels, buttons at the top, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Flap chest pockets, diagonal side pockets and an elasticated seam at the back of the waist. Fake fly, pleats at the front and straight, ankle-length legs.
Wide top in soft jersey with short dolman sleeves with lace insets and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in thin, printed cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist, wide waist panel and open pocket on one leg.
Blouse in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Wide, tie-front collar, a V-shaped opening at the top and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
